channel.title: User Experience on JM Santiago III

item.title: Welcome to TREX: Simplifying Machine Learning's Complexity
item.description: Dive into our detailed blog post on the development of TREX, a revolutionary tool designed to make machine learning accessible for visual programmers. From the inception to the latest improvements, learn how we combined Google Blockly and Sci-kit Learn to create a user-friendly platform for novice programmers.
